testsuite.name: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: Given I set up the LTI consumer key and shared secret if not already done
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: And I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: When I go to the Role Manager page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: And I click to edit the "Instructor" role
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: Then I am on the Role Editor page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: Then I set Create Class privilege to "true"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: Then I set the Create LTI Mapping privilege to "false"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: Then I click Submit
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: And I directly log out
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: When I launch random "basic-lti-launch-request" LTI request with role "Instructor" and outcome URL "default" and document target "window"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false

testcase.name: Then I see the Error Accessing Module message
testcase.classname: Scenario: Check if LTI Mapping page can be accessed if Create LTI Mapping privilege is set to false
